verses.verse: <S%G4337>"Beware<s%> of <S%G4160>practicing<s%> your <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to be <S%G2300>noticed<s%> by them; <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> with your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G3752>"When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G4160>give<s%> <S%G1654>alms,<s%> do not <S%G4537>sound<s%> a <S%G4537>trumpet<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> you, as the <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and in the <S%G4505>streets,<s%> that they may be <S%G1392>honored<s%> by <S%G444>men.<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, they <S%G568>have<s%> their <S%G3408>reward<s%> in <S%G568>full.<s%>

"But when you <S%G4160>give<s%> <S%G1654>alms,<s%> do not let your <S%G710>left<s%> <S%G710>hand<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> your <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> is <S%G4160>doing<s%>
that your <S%G1654>alms<s%> may be in <S%G2927>secret;<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G2927>secret<s%> will <S%G591>repay<s%> you.

"And <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> you are not to be as the <S%G5273>hypocrites;<s%> for they <S%G5368>love<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> and <S%G4336>pray<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and on the <S%G4116>street<s%> <S%G1137>corners,<s%> in <S%G3704>order<s%> to be <S%G5316>seen<s%> by <S%G444>men.<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, they <S%G568>have<s%> their <S%G3408>reward<s%> in <S%G568>full.<s%>

"But you, <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G1525>go<s%> into your <S%G5009>inner<s%> <S%G5009>room,<s%> and when you have <S%G2808>shut<s%> your <S%G2374>door,<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> to your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is in <S%G2927>secret,<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G2927>secret<s%> will <S%G591>repay<s%> you.

"And when you are <S%G4336>praying,<s%> do not <S%G945>use<s%> <S%G945>meaningless<s%> <S%G945>repetition,<s%> as the <S%G1482>Gentiles<s%> do, for they <S%G1380>suppose<s%> that they will be <S%G1522>heard<s%> for their <S%G4180>many<s%> <S%G4180>words.<s%>
<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> do not be <S%G3666>like<s%> them; for your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G5532>need,<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> Him.
<S%G4336>"Pray,<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>way:<s%> 'Our <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> art in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G37>Hallowed<s%> be Thy <S%G3686>name.<s%>
'Thy <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%> Thy <S%G2307>will<s%> be <S%G1096>done,<s%> On <S%G1093>earth<s%> as it is in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>
<S%G1325>'Give<s%> us <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> our <S%G1967>daily<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>
'And <S%G863>forgive<s%> us our <S%G3783>debts,<s%> as we <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G863>forgiven<s%> our <S%G3781>debtors.<s%>

'And do not <S%G1533>lead<s%> us into <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> but <S%G4506>deliver<s%> us from <S%G4190>evil.<s%> [For <S%G4771>Thine<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and the <S%G1411>power,<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>]'
"For <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> for their <S%G3900>transgressions,<s%> your <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> you.
"But <S%G1437>if<s%> you do not <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3761>then<s%> your <S%G3962>Father<s%> will not <S%G863>forgive<s%> your <S%G3900>transgressions.<s%>

"And <S%G3752>whenever<s%> you <S%G3522>fast,<s%> do not <S%G1096>put<s%> on a <S%G4659>gloomy<s%> <S%G4659>face<s%> as the <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%> [do,] for they <S%G853>neglect<s%> their <S%G4383>appearance<s%> in <S%G3704>order<s%> to be <S%G5316>seen<s%> <S%G3522>fasting<s%> by <S%G444>men.<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, they <S%G568>have<s%> their <S%G3408>reward<s%> in <S%G568>full.<s%>
"But you, when you <S%G3522>fast,<s%> <S%G218>anoint<s%> your <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G3538>wash<s%> your <S%G4383>face<s%>

<S%G3704>so<s%> that you may not be <S%G5316>seen<s%> <S%G3522>fasting<s%> by <S%G444>men,<s%> but by your <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is in <S%G2931>secret;<s%> and your <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G991>sees<s%> in <S%G2931>secret<s%> will <S%G591>repay<s%> you.

"Do not <S%G2343>lay<s%> up for <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%> upon <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4597>moth<s%> and <S%G1035>rust<s%> <S%G853>destroy,<s%> and <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2812>thieves<s%> <S%G1358>break<s%> in and <S%G2813>steal.<s%>

"But <S%G2343>lay<s%> up for <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G2344>treasures<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4597>moth<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1035>rust<s%> <S%G853>destroys,<s%> and <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2812>thieves<s%> do not <S%G1358>break<s%> in <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G2813>steal;<s%>
for <S%G3699>where<s%> your <S%G2344>treasure<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> will your <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G2532>also.<s%>

"The <S%G3088>lamp<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> is the <S%G3788>eye;<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> your <S%G3788>eye<s%> is <S%G573>clear,<s%> your <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> will be <S%G5460>full<s%> of <S%G5460>light.<s%>

"But <S%G1437>if<s%> your <S%G3788>eye<s%> is <S%G4190>bad,<s%> your <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> will be <S%G4652>full<s%> of <S%G4652>darkness.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> that is in you is <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>great<s%> is the <S%G4655>darkness!<s%>

<S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2962>masters;<s%> for <S%G2228>either<s%> he will <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> and <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2087>other,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> he will <S%G472>hold<s%> to <S%G1520>one<s%> and <S%G2706>despise<s%> the <S%G2087>other.<s%> You <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3126>mammon.<s%>

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, do not be <S%G3309>anxious<s%> for your <S%G5590>life,<s%> [as to] <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G2068>eat,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G4095>drink;<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> for your <S%G4983>body,<s%> [as to] <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G1746>put<s%> on. Is not <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G5160>food,<s%> and the <S%G4983>body<s%> than <S%G1742>clothing<s%>?

<S%G1689>"Look<s%> at the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air,<s%> that they do not <S%G4687>sow,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> do they <S%G2325>reap,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G4863>gather<s%> into <S%G596>barns,<s%> and [yet] your <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5142>feeds<s%> them. Are you not <S%G1308>worth<s%> <S%G3123>much<s%> <S%G1308>more<s%> than they?
"And <S%G5101>which<s%> of you by being <S%G3309>anxious<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4369>add<s%> a [single] <S%G4083>cubit<s%> to his life's <S%G2244>span<s%>?

"And <S%G5101>why<s%> are you <S%G3309>anxious<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G1742>clothing<s%>? <S%G2648>Observe<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> the <S%G2918>lilies<s%> of the <S%G68>field<s%> <S%G837>grow;<s%> they do not <S%G2872>toil<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> do they <S%G3514>spin,<s%>

<S%G1161>yet<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> did not <S%G4016>clothe<s%> himself <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3778>these.<s%>

"But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G294>arrays<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G68>field,<s%> which is [alive] <S%G4594>today<s%> and <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> is <S%G906>thrown<s%> into the <S%G2823>furnace,<s%> [will He] not <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> [do so for] you, O <S%G3640>men<s%> of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith<s%>?

"Do not be <S%G3309>anxious<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> shall we <S%G2068>eat<s%>?' <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> shall we <S%G4095>drink<s%>?' <S%G2228>or<s%> 'With <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4016>clothe<s%> ourselves?'

"For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1934>eagerly<s%> <S%G1934>seek;<s%> for your <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> that you <S%G5535>need<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>
"But <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> His <S%G932>kingdom<s%> and His <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> shall be <S%G4369>added<s%> to you.

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> do not be <S%G3309>anxious<s%> for <S%G839>tomorrow;<s%> for <S%G839>tomorrow<s%> will <S%G3309>care<s%> for <S%G1438>itself.<s%> [Each] <S%G2250>day<s%> has <S%G713>enough<s%> <S%G2549>trouble<s%> of its own.
